title: Austin Meetup This Monday
summary:
Key ideas
- Scott is hosting a meetup in Austin on Monday, September 30 at Central Market North Lamar.
- Anyone is welcome to come, regardless of whether they typically read Scott's blog or not.
- The meetup is part of the Meetups Everywhere tour.

Key learnings
- Scott values in-person meetups as a way to connect with readers.
- Meetups Everywhere is a way to facilitate these meetups around the world.
- Scott is open and welcoming to all who want to attend the Austin meetup.

Key questions
- Who will attend the meetup?
- Will it be possible to accommodate everyone in the planned location?
- How will Scott structure the meetup to allow for meaningful connections among attendees?
